code: import{createStore,combineReducers}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import authSlice from'../slices/authSlice';import salesSlice from'../slices/salesSlice';var rootReducer=combineReducers({auth:authSlice,sales:salesSlice});export var store=createStore(rootReducer);export var useAppDispatch=function useAppDispatch(){return useDispatch();};
